channel.title: Steam summer sale! Have they fixed the FOV issue yet?
channel.description:
I will never, EVER, pay a developer for a game locked at a 90 FOV limit, because I don' like getting headaches/nausea. Have they fixed the max fov of 90 problem with Black Mesa yet?
On a 32 inch monitor at 3 feet away, fov 110 is minimum for me and I really want to buy/play this game....but not if it's locked at 90 as the max.
I'm not speaking about the view model BTW.
thanks for your attention :slight_smile:
